<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>

Updates the task statuses with the values specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"statuses":{"description":"New task statuses","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","title":"CustomTaskStatus"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
